keyword: how many calories in mcmuffin with egg and sausage
title: How Many Calories in a McMuffin with Egg and Sausage?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in mcmuffin with egg and sausage, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a McMuffin with Egg and Sausage?
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; standard preparation, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, location, recipe changes, and customizations; values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data. Check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage McMuffin with Egg contains about 480 kcal and 21 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in mcmuffin with egg and sausage?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per mcmuffin.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a mcmuffin with egg and sausage?
faqs.a: Around 31 g total fat, including 13 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does the mcmuffin with egg and sausage have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.3 g of trans fat from the sausage.

faqs.q: How does sodium compare in a Sausage Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: It contains roughly 830 mg of sodium, which is about 35% of daily value.
